response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $1,000,000. However, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a piece that could potentially save you thousands in the long run and elevate your business to new heights. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your organization.", "product_price": 950000}
